definition: a chemical element. Neon is a gas that does not react with anything and that shines with a bright light when electricity is passed through it.
a life that some people believe exists after death
a sudden attempt to remove a government by force
a chemical element. Gallium is a soft silver-white metal.
a mistake that a person makes in public or in a social situation, especially something embarrassing
a ceremony, often a religious one, for burying or cremating (= burning) a dead person
used to tell somebody that they, and nobody else, will have to deal with the unpleasant results of their own actions
not easy; needing effort or skill to do or to understand
full of problems; causing a lot of trouble
not easy to please; not helpful
to have difficulty doing something
the unit of money in China
happening between members of the same group, country or organization
not studying or looking at something carefully or completely; seeing only what is obvious
appearing to be true, real or important until you look at it more carefully
only affecting the surface and therefore not serious
not serious or important and not having any depth of understanding or feeling
of or on the surface of something
not having much distance between the top or surface and the bottom
not showing serious thought, feelings, etc. about something
shallow breathing involves taking in only a small amount of air each time
the top part of the foot between the ankle and toes
the part of a shoe that covers the instep
a person whose job is to collect and write news stories for newspapers, magazines, radio, television or online news sites
strong black coffee made by forcing steam or boiling water through ground coffee
a cup of espresso
used, especially in a list, below a particular word or phrase, to show that it is repeated and to avoid having to write it again
the quality of needing to be dealt with or happen immediately
the feeling or belief that something needs to be dealt with immediately
a weapon which consists of a bow that is fixed onto a larger piece of wood, and that shoots short heavy arrows (called bolts)
to give somebody/something new life or energy
to make somebody start breathing again or become conscious again after they have almost died
a chemical element. Germanium is a shiny grey element that is similar to a metal (= is a metalloid).
a very small freshwater fish
a company or sports team that is small or unimportant
violent behaviour that is intended to hurt or kill somebody
physical or emotional force and energy
to damage something or have a bad effect on it
the loss or destruction of a ship at sea because of a storm or because it hits rocks, etc.
a ship that has been lost or destroyed at sea
to find an acceptable way of dealing with two or more ideas, needs, etc. that seem to be opposed to each other
to make people become friends again after an argument or a disagreement
to make somebody/yourself accept an unpleasant situation because it is not possible to change it
the fact of not having the necessary qualifications to have or to do something
the inner part of the field in baseball, cricket and some other sports; the players in this part of the field
a large flat shellfish. Some types of oyster can be eaten and others produce shiny white jewels called pearls.
there is no limit to the opportunities open to you
very fat, in a way that is not healthy
an artificial part of the body, for example a leg, an eye or a tooth
a safety device in a car that fills with air if there is an accident, to protect the people in the car
a model of a human body, used for displaying clothes in shops
a person whose job is to wear and display new styles of clothes
feeling or showing dislike or fear of people from other countries
a chemical element. Krypton is a gas that does not react with anything, used in fluorescent lights and lasers.
a chemical element. Xenon is a gas that is found in very small quantities in the air and is used in some special electric lamps.
joined to another house by a wall on one side that is shared
in a way that is related to sound or to the sense of hearing
using musical instruments that make sound naturally, not using electrical equipment
a radioactive chemical element. Hafnium is a hard silver-grey metal.
a group of things of the same type that grow or appear close together
a group of people, animals or things close together
a group of consonants that come together in a word or phrase, for example /str/ at the beginning of string
the worst moment of a particular situation
a chemical element. Hassium is produced when atoms crash into each other.
to make somebody feel less angry or upset
a chemical element. Tellurium is a shiny, silver-white substance that breaks easily, found in sulphide ores.
a chemical element. Polonium is a radioactive metal that is present in nature when uranium decays.
a chemical element. Indium is a soft silver-white metal.
to change repeatedly in size, amount, quality, etc. from one extreme to another
a small insect that lives in highly organized groups. There are many types of ant.
to be very excited or impatient about something and unable to stay still
a strong shoe that covers the foot and ankle and often the lower part of the leg
the space at the back of a car that you put bags, cases, etc. in
a quick hard kick
a device that is attached to the wheel of a car that has been parked illegally, so that it cannot be driven away
to be told that you must leave your job or that a relationship you are having with somebody is over
to be/become too proud of yourself; to behave as if you are more important than you really are
used to say that a situation has changed so that somebody now has power or authority over the person who used to have power or authority over them
used to invite somebody to take as much as they like of something such as food, drink, etc; help yourself
to do somebody’s job in an acceptable way when they are not there
to show too much respect for somebody in authority because you want to please them
to kick somebody very hard, especially when they are on the ground
to attack somebody by criticizing them when they are in a difficult situation
to be very frightened or nervous
used to add a comment to something that you have said
very strong and able to deal successfully with difficult conditions or situations
shut
shut, especially of a shop or public building that is not open for a period of time
not willing to accept outside influences or new ideas
limited to a particular group of people; not open to everyone
without the public being allowed to attend or know what is happening; in private
a subject or person that you know nothing about
very easily, without thinking about it
not wearing any clothes
involving people who are not wearing any clothes
skin-coloured
details of where somebody lives or works and where letters, etc. can be sent
a series of words and symbols that tells you where you can find something using a computer or phone, for example on the internet
a formal speech that is made in front of an audience
the correct title, etc. to use when you talk to somebody
to get rid of urine from the body
to pass waste liquid from your body
a chemical element. Holmium is a soft silver-white metal.
a chemical element. Iridium is a very hard yellow-white metal, used especially in making alloys.
